channel.title: Asides on Deuts Log
channel.description: Recent content in Asides on Deuts Log

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01KHPAER0QZ2M4DTMBGB9ZJGDP
item.description:
Why I really want #Seafile to work for me

  • A lot of users report that Seafile sync is significantly faster than #Nextcloud, especially for large libraries.
  • I genuinely like Seafile’s extended properties (metadata) feature — it feels more structured and usable compared to Nextcloud.
  • Unlike #PaperlessNGX / #Papra, I can directly edit Office files, which makes it more than just a document archive.

I’m really hoping this setup works out, because on paper it checks all the right boxes for my workflow.
item.content:encoded:
Why I really want #Seafile to work for me

  • A lot of users report that Seafile sync is significantly faster than #Nextcloud, especially for large libraries.
  • I genuinely like Seafile’s extended properties (metadata) feature — it feels more structured and usable compared to Nextcloud.
  • Unlike #PaperlessNGX / #Papra, I can directly edit Office files, which makes it more than just a document archive.

I’m really hoping this setup works out, because on paper it checks all the right boxes for my workflow.

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01KHPA0QEKGXQHJRJWG3NDHB8Q
item.description:
Another #Papra update drops today, but none of the updates that mattered to me:

  • Custom document properties (metadata), not just tags
  • Ability to move documents between organizations
  • Search for organization names
item.content:encoded:
Another #Papra update drops today, but none of the updates that mattered to me:

  • Custom document properties (metadata), not just tags
  • Ability to move documents between organizations
  • Search for organization names

item.description: This looks like not a bad deal for a 32gb ram dedicated server from #OVHCloud
item.content:encoded: This looks like not a bad deal for a 32gb ram dedicated server from #OVHCloud

item.title: Ignidash
item.description:
Ignidash

An open-source, AI-powered alternative to ProjectionLab for planning your long-term personal finances. Features include monte carlo simulations, historical backtesting, US tax estimation, and AI chat & insights.
item.content:encoded:
Ignidash

An open-source, AI-powered alternative to ProjectionLab for planning your long-term personal finances. Features include monte carlo simulations, historical backtesting, US tax estimation, and AI chat & insights.

item.title: RustFS
item.description:
RustFS

2.3x faster than MinIO for 4KB object payloads. RustFS is an open-source, S3-compatible high-performance object storage system supporting migration and coexistence with other S3-compatible platforms such as MinIO and Ceph.
item.content:encoded:
RustFS

2.3x faster than MinIO for 4KB object payloads. RustFS is an open-source, S3-compatible high-performance object storage system supporting migration and coexistence with other S3-compatible platforms such as MinIO and Ceph.

item.title: Will be done
item.description:
Will be done

Self-hosted, offline-first, open source kanban task manager for visual weekly planning with drag & drop everything and vim keybindings.
item.content:encoded:
Will be done

Self-hosted, offline-first, open source kanban task manager for visual weekly planning with drag & drop everything and vim keybindings.

item.title: FrankMD
item.description:
FrankMD

Self-hosted, Simple Markdown Web Editor and Notes Organizer.
With Hugo blog post support - create posts with proper directory structure.
item.content:encoded:
FrankMD

Self-hosted, Simple Markdown Web Editor and Notes Organizer.
With Hugo blog post support - create posts with proper directory structure.

item.title: Haven
item.description:
Haven

Self-hosted private chat — your server, your rules. No cloud, no telemetry, no Big Tech. Discord alternative that runs on your own machine.
item.content:encoded:
Haven

Self-hosted private chat — your server, your rules. No cloud, no telemetry, no Big Tech. Discord alternative that runs on your own machine.

item.title: Docktail
item.description:
Docktail

Expose Docker containers as Tailscale Services using label-based configuration.
This is probably the docker image we’ve been waiting for. Easily expose docker containers to tailscale. No need for Tailscale sidecar.
item.content:encoded:
Docktail

Expose Docker containers as Tailscale Services using label-based configuration.
This is probably the docker image we’ve been waiting for. Easily expose docker containers to tailscale. No need for Tailscale sidecar.

item.title: Oxi Cloud
item.description:
Oxi Cloud

☁️ Ultra-fast, secure & lightweight self-hosted cloud storage — your files, photos, calendars & contacts, all in one place. Built in Rust.
item.content:encoded:
Oxi Cloud

☁️ Ultra-fast, secure & lightweight self-hosted cloud storage — your files, photos, calendars & contacts, all in one place. Built in Rust.
